ingredients.item: 25g Waitrose Love Life 3 Colour Quinoa Blend
2 essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Fillets

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ºC, gas mark 6.
Cook the quinoa in boiling water for 15 minutes. Drain and mix in the tomato paste and basil.
Put the chicken in a roasting tin and season. Press the quinoa on top and bake for 20-25 minutes. Check chicken is cooked with no pink meat.
Meanwhile, cook the potatoes for 10-15 minutes until tender, and drain. Serve with the chicken and salad.
